programme.desc: Stories that suggest aliens are among us, including an Arizona woman who claims to have been fathered by an alien in a top-secret government experiment.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence

programme.desc: Aliens And The Creation Of Man: Can unexplained advances in human evolution be attributed to alien architects? Alien theorists look at the evidence. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Storm's A-Brewin: Tempers flare as hordes of angry customers face hour- long lines, Les must work out whether a dealer's wheeling stolen goods, and Seth and Ashley's feud erupts. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn

programme.desc: A Loose Cannon: Chum is d'oh-lighted when a seller comes in with a giant collection of figurines from The Simpsons. Meanwhile, Corey checks out an old playing card shuffler.

programme.desc: In Dusty We Trust: The blazing heat in Riverside inspires Lisa and Kenny to break out the parasols. Dusty wears his intuition on his sleeve and Ivy releases the hounds. (S13, ep 30)

programme.desc: The Hunch-Back of La Habra: The buyers try their luck at a new La Habra facility where Ivy teaches them a lesson. Meanwhile, Dusty brews himself up an interesting unit. (S14, ep 1)

programme.desc: The 300th Times the Charm!: Brandi and Lisa's friendship is tested as they go head-to-head on a pair of lockers. Kenny sets his fears aside and takes the plunge on a unit. (S14, ep 2)

programme.desc: Plankton disguises himself as SpongeBob's grandmother in 'Gramma's Secret Recipe', and then in 'The Cent Of Money', Mr Krabs uses Gary to find spare change.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Ymunwch gyda Tref y ci, Elin a Berian wrth iddynt edrych ar l pob math o anifeiliaid gyda help eu ffrindiau ifanc. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Come join us!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Pan mae Twm Twrch yn sylweddoli ei fod yn gorfod bod mewn tri lle ar yr un pryd, mae Llyfryn yn ei helpu drwy greu tri ohono. Twm Twrch realises he has to be in three places at once, uh-oh!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond heddiw rhyw swn aflafar sy'n mynd o dan ei groen. Beth ydi'r grwnian di-baid yna? Today, an annoying buzzing noise is upsetting everyone.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Llew wedi cyffroi'n ln. Mae'n credu ei fod yn ben-blwydd arno heddiw! Yn anffodus, yfory mae ei ben-blwydd. Llew thinks it's his birthday but it's not until tomorrow. He's confused!

programme.title: Kim a Ct a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Ct ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Ct as they search for the character Twrch in the woods.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Tro ma: Lloegr. Awn i Lundain i weld y tirnodau enwog a bwyta bwyd traddodiadol fel sgod a sglod. We visit London and its landmarks and eat some traditional food like fish and chips.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mabli yn gwahodd ei ffrindiau i chwarae gwesty yn ei thy! When she forgets to listen to her guests' needs, Mabli's Hotel doesn't go quite as she'd hoped.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Pan fydd wy newydd Dili Minllyn yn mynd ar goll, dim ond Guto Gwningen sy'n gallu dod o hyd i'r lleidr. When Dili Minllyn's new egg goes missing, Guto Gwningen tries to find the culprit.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Dywed Sali Mali wrth ei ffrindiau am beidio ag ofni'r wenynen sy'n suo o'u cwmpas, ond mae Jaci Soch yn ei gwylltio a chaiff ei golio ar ei ben-l! This time, the friends encounter a bee!

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Cled Ceiliog wedi cael swydd newydd ar Fferm y Waun, ac mae'n edrych ymlaen at ddechrau gweithio yno. Cled Ceiliog has a big secret that he's worried about revealing to the others.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pa anifeiliaid mae Aled yn galw arnynt i greu Pawenlu Pitw? Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Aled sets up his own mini-Patrol.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwich wedi dweud wrth ei frawd fod e'n byw yn y Crawcdy. Felly pan ddaw ei frawd i ymweld mae na drafferth! Ratty's brother comes to visit so Ratty pretends to live in Toad Hall!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Caradog y ceiliog a Marged a'i chwningen. Today we meet Caradog the cockerel and Marged and her rabbit.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Fflwff yn ceisio bwyta popeth mae Brethyn yn casglu i'w cartref. Mae'n anodd pacio bag bwyd pan ma Fflwff ar hyd lle! Fluff tries to eat everything Tweedy finds to take back to the den.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod y tymhorau'n newid?' yw cwestiwn Nanw heddiw, ac mae gan Dad-cu ateb dwl a doniol. Grandpa spins a tale about 4 rhubarb-loving monsters and the girl who teaches them a lesson!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan mae hen elyn eu rhieni'n ymosod mae Jetboi a Jetferch yn cyfuno'u doniau i drechu'r dihiryn, neu dyna'r bwriad te be! When their parents' old enemy attacks, Jet-boy and Jet-girl unite.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Gellionnen sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Gellionnen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Amser i ddathlu a dysgu sgiliau choux, gan gynnwys sut i greu patisserie eiconig: y Paris Brest! In their latest kitchen test, the bakers get a handle on choux pastry and also celebrate! [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: David Oliver sy'n dilyn l carnau ceffyl i ben draw'r byd yng nghwmni'r ffermwr ifanc, Joe Parry. David Oliver follows the story of a remarkable horse to Australia with farmer Joe Parry.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Yn y bennod hon: hybu cerddoriaeth Cymru mewn sawl ffordd greadigol, cip ar brosiect ffotograffiaeth, a golwg ar waith cymunedol yn Wrecsam. This time: music, photography and community arts.

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Ysbyty: Dan Bwysau
programme.desc: Awn i Adran Argyfwng Maelor Wrecsam; cawn olwg onest ar be sy'n achosi eu problemau a sut ma'r ysbyty am ddatrys pethau. We take an unflinching look at Wrexham Maelor's Emergency department.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Dywed Sali Mali wrth ei ffrindiau am beidio ag ofni'r wenynen sy'n suo o'u cwmpas, ond mae Jaci Soch yn ei gwylltio a chaiff ei golio ar ei ben-l! This time, the friends encounter a bee!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Seth yn gofyn 'Pam bod siocled mor flasus?' ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori ddwl a doniol am yr adeg pan roedd siocled yn blasu'n ofnadwy! Seth asks 'Why is chocolate so tasty?'.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae yna aur ym Mhorth yr Haul! Ond pwy sydd wedi cipio'r trysor? When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Porth yr Aur, it's a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan mae Lili Lafant a Cwstenin Cranc yn uno, mae Jet-fab am eu trechu. Dysga Jetboi mai gwendid nid mantais yw derbyn cymorth. Jet-boy learns that receiving help is indeed not a weakness.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Bedol sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Bedol join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: SeliGo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Seligo heddiw? What's happening in the Seligo world today?

programme.title: Ar Goll yn Oz
programme.desc: Mae Langwidere yn mynnu bod y tm yn adfer perl hudol Glenda ond dyw pethau ddim yn gweithio'n llyfn! Langwidere convinces the team to retrieve Glenda's magical pearl, but things go wrong!

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae 'na dipyn o drafferth y tro hwn... gyda gliw! There's some trouble this time... involving glue!

programme.title: Gwrach y Rhibyn
programme.desc: Mae'n ras yn erbyn amser i ysgolion Bro Myrddin, Brynrefail, Eifionydd a Tryfan ac mae yna sawl rhwystr arall o'u blaenau. We've reached the final hour. Will the four teams succeed?

programme.title: Dathlu!
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd, llawn hwyl a fydd yn dilyn plant a'u teuluoedd wrth iddyn nhw ddathlu dathliad arbennig gyda'i gilydd. This time, Gwenlli and her friends prepare to celebrate Easter Sunday.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Wrth grwydro ei filltir sgwr daw'r awdur Harri Parri i ddargnafod rhai o straeon mwyaf arswydus Pen Llyn. As he explores the Llyn Peninsula, Harri Parri discovers the area's scary stories.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno thm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Ers dros canrif, mae milfeddygon Ystwyth Fets wedi brwydro'n ddi-ddiwedd i edrych ar l anifeiliaid Ceredigion - ac mae'r cameru yn l. The cameras are back at Ystwyth Fets, Aberystwyth.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Marw gyda Kris
programme.desc: Kris Hughes sy'n teithio'r byd i weld sut ma eraill yn delio marwolaeth. Oes ffyrdd gwell o alaru? Mortician Kris Hughes travels the world looking at different ways of dealing with death.

programme.title: Pobol y Penwythnos
programme.desc: Angharad a Caryl sy'n rhannu profiadau eu penwythnos perffaith - dyma ddwy sy'n byw am ddihangfa'r Sul. My weekend escape: a day in the life of sea swimmer Angharad and power-lifter Caryl.

programme.title: New: Mini Hana Medi
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae Hana'n rhoi'r paneli at ei gilydd, yn meistroli'r grefft o weldo, yn adeiladu 'roll-cage', ac yn prynu siwt rasio! This time, Hana welds, builds - and shops for a racing suit!

programme.title: New: Mini Hana Medi
programme.desc: Mae Hana'n gorffen y 'gragen' ac yn teithio i'r Drenewydd lle mae'r car yn cael ei baratoi am baent. Hana finishes the 'shell' and travels to Newtown where the car is prepared for paint.

programme.title: Gareth!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd Gareth yn cyfweld y gantores aml-dalentog o Gaerdydd - Lily Beau, ynghyd a'r cyn bel-droediwr a sylwebydd eiconig, Malcom Allen. Join Gareth for chats, games and a song.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r dreigiau'n gyffrous gan fod Cadi yn mynd nhw i'r sinema, ond mae'r ffilm wedi mynd ar goll! All Bledd a Cef achub y dydd? The dragons are excited - Cadi is taking them to the cinema!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Yng nghanol prysurdeb y paratoi ar gyfer y Nadolig, mae'r Rheolwr Tew yn rhoi gwaith pwysig iawn i Henri. Henry loses a box when the Fat Controller sends him on a special Christmas mission.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Guto Gwningen heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Guto Gwningen's world today?

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Youssef yn galw Harri i ddweud fod sinc wedi torri yn y Cwtsh Newydd, Rhydaman. Mae Harri'n gneud dipyn o lanast yno! Youssef calls Harri to say that a sink has broken in Cwtsh Newydd!

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Pry Bach Tew'n benderfynol o ennill y gystadleuaeth Hetiau Pasg, hyd yn oed drwy dwyll! Pry Bach is determined to win an Easter Bonnet competition by fair means or foul, but does he?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Weithiau mae'n hawdd tynnu sylw Pablo oddi ar beth mae o fod i'w wneud. Felly mae'n rhaid i'r anifeiliaid ei achub o Dir Tynnu Sylw. Pablo is easily distracted sometimes, like he is today!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, rydyn ni'n teithio i wlad sy'n ynys o'r enw Madagasgar. Yma byddwn ni'n dysgu ychydig o iaith Malagasi, dysgu am fanila ac ymweld 'r brifddinas Antananarivo. Today: Madagascar!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Co' Bach yn llwyddo i feddu ar bwer y Jet-faneg. Ond, drwy lwc, nid o ddyfeisiadau y daw gwir bwer - ond o'r galon. Co' Bach manages to possess the power of the Jet-glove.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Melin Gruffydd sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Melin Gruffydd join Pwdryn and Melys to play some candyland-themed games.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Pan aiff 'stori frwydr' Mwmintada a Mwmintrol dros ben llestri daw anghenfil o bysgodyn yn fyw. When Moomintada and Moomintrol's 'battle story' gets out of hand a fish monster comes to life.

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda teulu'r Anhygoels, Llew ac Od, a chriw Steddfod Sili. Join Cadi, Luke, Jed and Miriam in the comedy series Chwarter Call.

programme.title: LEGO Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae'r merched dal yn erlid Pransky, yr arist graffiti, ac mae'r erlid yn eu harwain i'r goedwig. An attempt to catch a graffiti artist leads to a forest fire in the woods.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd ffeithiol hwyliog sy'n ateb y math o gwestiynau sydd gennych am y byd o'ch cwmpas. New factual light-hearted series which answers your questions about the world around you.

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Gwers jiwdo gyda'r judoka Olympaidd Natalie Powell, Heledd a Lloyd yn cael tro ar gleddyfaeth, a chlwb martial arts Tremadog yw'r nesaf i daclo Sialens y Sgwad. This time: martial arts.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd y tm yn creu rhywbeth arbennig ar gyfer gofalwyr ifanc yn yr YMCA yng Nghaerdydd. This time, the team create something special for the young carers at the YMCA in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Andria sy'n cael sylw Cadi ac Owain heddiw - actores o Abertawe sy'n chwilio am wisg addas ar gyfer mynd i theatr y West End yn Llundain. This time, we need an outfit fit for the West End! [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sy'n 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref Y Bala sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This week Geraint Hardy discovers what Bala has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Wedi trip i'r acwariwm mae'r pobyddion yn pobi cacen morol er mwyn sicrhau lle yn y rownd nesa. After a trip to the aquarium, the bakers make sea-themed cakes in a bid to stay in the game. [SL]

programme.title: Sgorio: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd
programme.desc: Gm fyw o'r Cymru Premier JD ar benwythnos olaf y tymor: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. C/G 12.45. Live JD Cymru Premier game on the season's final weekend: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. K/O 12.45.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, daw taith Gwilym i'w therfyn gyda chyngerdd wrth droed mynyddoedd yr Andes. This time, Gwilym's visit to Patagonia comes to an end with a concert held at the foot of the Andes. [SL]

programme.title: Llond Bol o Sbaen: Chris yn Barcelona
programme.desc: Olaf y gyfres. Aiff Chris i Barcelona i ddarganfod diwylliant bwyd bywiog y ddinas, yng nghwmni Cerys Matthews. Tapas! Paella! Chris heads to Barcelona accompanied by Cerys Matthews. [SL]

programme.title: Cymru Wyllt Gudd
programme.desc: Ar hyd y dydd rhed y dwr, ac ry' ni am ei ddilyn o bennau'r mynyddoedd uchaf i'r dyfnderoedd Celtaidd. An epic journey following Wales' rivers, discovering wild secrets along the way. [SL]

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Dreigiau v Scarlets
programme.desc: Gm fyw Dydd y Farn Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig rhwng y Dreigiau a'r Scarlets. Stadiwm Principality. K/O 17.30. Live Judgement Day United Rugby Championship - Dragons v Scarlets. K/O 17.30.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Alun, Chris a Kiri yn Seland Newydd
programme.desc: Mae Chris Roberts, Kiri Pritchard McLean ac Alun Williams ar daith drwy Seland Newydd. Chef Chris Roberts, comedian Kiri Pritchard McLean, and presenter Alun Williams visit New Zealand.

programme.title: Bronwen Lewis: O'r Stafell Fyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld Bronwen yn llwyfannu ei thaith 'Yr Ystafell Fyw' ar lwyfan Canolfan y Celfyddydau Pontardawe. We see Bronwen staging her 'Living Room' tour onstage of Pontardawe Arts Centre.

programme.title: Curadur
programme.desc: Pennod o 'Tu Fewn i'r Felin' gyda'r cyflwynydd Rheinallt Sion ap Siencyn (Jenkins) wrth iddo ymweld Melin Melyn ym Melin. We visit the band Melin Melyn, and also hear from Bitw and Mwsog.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Abbey a Danial o Bwllheli yw'r pr hyfryd sy'n cael priodas am 5000 y tro ma! Abbey and Danial from Pwllheli are this week's lucky couple, and their friends and family are here to muck in.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Gyda'r tyllau yn llawn dop o rai bach, mae'n amser wynebu realiti bywyd tu allan. The burrows are overflowing with young. How do the animals cope with overcrowding and predation?

programme.title: At The Earth's Core
programme.desc: 1976. Adventure. Directed by Kevin Connor. Stars Doug McClure, Peter Cushing, Caroline Munro & Cy Grant. A Victorian Scientist miscalculates his new machine and ends up in the Earth's core. [S]

programme.title: The Night Visitor
programme.desc: 1971. Crime horror starring Max von Sydow, Trevor Howard and Liv Ullmann. Salem escapes from an insane asylum where he was confined for being an axe-murderer. Music by Mancini.

programme.title: Second Chorus
programme.desc: 1941. Musical. Two college students are forced to earn a living by joining a band. (Nominated for 2 Oscars). Stars: Fred Astaire, Paulette Goddard, Artie Shaw & Burgess Meredith. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: 1962. French pop singer Claude Franois sings the catchy 60s hit Belles, Belles, Belles.

programme.title: The Sword of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: 1951. Adventure. Stars George Montgomery, Rita Corday & Berry Kroeger. Set in 19th Century France, The country's conniving chief minister will stop at nothing to gain possession of the sword. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed in the second half of April. [S]

programme.title: It's a Great Day
programme.desc: 1955. Starring Ruth Dunning, Edward Evans, Sidney James, Sheila Sweet, Peter Bryant, Nancy Roberts and Vera Day. Comedy based on the hugely successful TV series 'The Groves'. [S]

programme.title: Gorgo
programme.desc: 1961. Sci-Fi. An undersea earthquake causes some sea-monsters to surface. Gorgo is captured and taken to be displayed in London, but Gorgo's mother is looking for her baby. Starring Bill Travers. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Keeping Tabs on Space
programme.desc: 1967. A fascinating look at Britain's first spacecraft - UK3, with a glimpse at how it was created, tested and launched.

programme.title: Scrooge
programme.desc: 1935. Family. Ebenezer Scrooge (Seymour Hicks) is persuaded to change his ways one Christmas by visitations from the ghosts of Christmas past, present and yet-to-come. Also stars Donald Calthrop. [S]

programme.title: Melody
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by Waris Hussein. Stars Mark Lester, Tracy Hyde & Jack Wild. Two youngsters declare to their parents they want to get married as soon as possible. [S]

programme.title: Pollyanna
programme.desc: 2002. Drama. Directed by Sarah Harding. Stars Amanda Burton, Tom Bell & Kenneth Cranham. Young orphan Pollyanna, bringing mirth and mayhem to her new home, goes to stay with her Aunt Polly. [S]

programme.title: The Happiest Days of Your Life
programme.desc: 1950. Comedy. Directed by Frank Launder. Stars Alastair Sim, Margaret Rutherford & John Turnbull. Chaos ensues for staff and students when an all-boys and an all-girls school are merged into one. [S]

programme.title: The Riddle Of The Sands
programme.desc: 1978. Adventure. Director: Tony Maylam. Stars Michael York, Jenny Agutter & Simon MacCorkindale. Set in 1901, a pair of British yachtsmen discover a German plot to invade England. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Enfield Poltergeist. 1995. Michael Aspel presents one of the most remarkable cases of poltergeist activity - occurring in North London, it is simply known as the Enfield poltergeist. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for an epic night of horror and thrills. We start with Doomwatch - The Iron Doctor, a gripping episode about the strange and sinister events surrounding a hospital computer. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: The Iron Doctor. 1971. Stars John Nolan, Jean Trend & Keith Grenville. A local hospital introduces a new electronic monitoring system for its patients - but is the machine failing? [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: The night continues with more peculiar occurrences in the 1965 horror Catacombs, also known as The Woman Who Wouldn't Die, directed by Gordon Hessler and written by Jay Bennett. [S]

programme.title: Catacombs
programme.desc: 1965. Horror. Directed by Gordon Hessler. Stars Georgina Cookson, Gary Merrill & Jane Merrow. An unfaithful husband decides to murder his wife, but he soon finds out the dead don't die so easily. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Can't wait until next week? Caroline Munro offers a peek at next week's dramatic features. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: 1963. Enjoy a brilliant performance from bass player and singer Heinz with Dreams Do Come True.

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Directed by Frank Capra. Stars Gary Cooper, Barbara Stanwyck & Edward Arnold. A drifter finds himself at the centre of a political movement after becoming part of a fraudulent story. [S]

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Directed by Frank Capra. Stars Gary Cooper, Barbara Stanwyck & Edward Arnold. A drifter finds himself at the centre of a political movement after becoming part of a fraudulent story. [S]

programme.title: The Perfect Woman (1981)
programme.desc: 1978. Two dumb aliens are sent to earth to find an earthwoman suitable to be the wife of their leader. Stars Cameron Mitchell. [S]

programme.title: Lazybones
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. Directed by Michael Powell. Stars Ian Hunter, Claire Luce & Bernard Nedell. Reg is expected to marry a wealthy American but she has been swindled and is penniless. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: A Sense of Values. 1964. Narrated by Niall MacGinnis. In 1937 Britain, soldiers rehearse for the Coronation but on the Continent, sandbags, air raid shelters and bombs presage things to come. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Down London River
programme.desc: 1962. A Look into a leisurely journey through London along the Thames.

programme.title: The Terror (1938)
programme.desc: 1938. Drama. Director: Richard Bird. Stars: Wilfrid Lawson, Richard Murdoch, Bernard Lee, Alastair Sims. No-one among the guests at Monk's Hall Priory suspects that The Terror is in their midst... [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed in the second half of April. [S]

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. The Penalty.Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Forgers. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Libby Morris & Ronnie Stevens. While investigating dying vegetation on Mars, Dart and Husky stumble across the source of forged currency. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An Egg Grows in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Edward Everett Horton. Egghead and his yeggs steal the Gotham City charter in a twisted plot to gain control of the city. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: Crown in Danger. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Peter Reynolds & Kevin Brennan. Three prisoners escape and take Sir Gilbert with them as hostage. Richard and his comrades set off to hunt them down. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: The Menacing Mist. 1939. Stars Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent & Dorothy Arnold. Dr Zorka's laboratory is raided by the Secret Service. [S]

programme.title: Mr Horatio Knibbles
programme.desc: 1970. Family comedy. Directed by Robert Hird. Stars Lesley Roach, Gary Smith & Rachel Brennock. Upset after not receiving a rabbit for her birthday, an imaginary rabbit friend appears for Mary. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Goodbye Little John. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Archie Duncan & Paul Eddington. Little John is concerned Will Scarlett has replaced him as Robin's lieutenant and he decides to leave the band. [S]

programme.title: Zontar - Thing From Venus
programme.desc: 1967. Sci-fi. Directed by Larry Buchanan. Stars John Agar, Susan Bjurman & Tony Huston. A young scientist believes an alien from Venus can help Earth but soon discovers it has a malevolent plan. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: Premonition. 1959. Starring Pamela Lincoln, Paul Langton and Skip Young. A girl becomes haunted by a premonition of her own death, but will it come true... [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Dangerous Cargo. 1963. Stars David Graham, Paul Maxwell & Sylvia Anderson. The team get permission to destroy a crumbling planet, unaware of the aliens that are waiting for them there.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Seek and Destroy. 1968. Stars Jeremy Wilkin, Sylvia Anderson, Donald Gray. When the Mysterons threaten to kill one of the Angels, Scarlet and Blue are sent to Paris to ensure Destiny is kept safe.

programme.title: A Hill in Korea
programme.desc: 1956. War. Directed by Julian Amyes. Stars George Baker, Stanley Baker & Michael Caine in his first credited film role. In the Korean war, British soldiers try to fight their way back to safety. [S]

programme.title: Green For Danger
programme.desc: 1947. Thriller. Director: Sidney Gilliat. Stars Trevor Howard, Sally Gray & Rosamund John. Against a background of bombing raids, a series of murders take place in a hospital during WW2. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Fairground. 1976. Stars James Ellis, David Jackson, Sheila Fay, John Duttine & David Sterne. A young girl is attacked, and Lynch has to look into 'all the fun of the fair'. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: The Night They Hit No.8. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas, Shelagh Fraser & Julie Goodyear. During a night of intense bombing the Ashton children are nowhere to be found. [S]

programme.title: Hombre

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.desc: Clover's Height Fright: When Pteddy gets stuck atop the Mile High Mesa, Clover must overcome his fear of heights by taking things one step at a time to help his friend. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Ballad of Big Jon: Prompted by a western hero, Jon wants to prove he's a real epic hero as well, but learns it's the smaller, more everyday good deeds that really make him a hero. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: One Good Turn: A pack of wild raptors go after Min and Jane as they're transporting a precious brontomelon in medicine wagon. They discover an act of kindness often returns with kindness. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Guitar Heroes: When the Ranchers need Ogie Tinhorn's help to return a skittish dinosaur to its family, Jon doesn't trust Ogie, then learns that even 'bad' guys have 'good' hearts. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Calling All Riders!: The Cassidys and Tinhorns face off in a race, but it's only through learning to work together that they're able to finish the race. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Ridin' Mighty: While helping Tara make an important delivery, Jon's confidence goes to his head causing care-less mistakes, and he must accept that there's always more a Rancher can learn. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Supersauruses- Ride!: Seeing how amazing Biscuit, Angus, and Quack are individually, the Jr Ranchers plan to put them together as a rescue team, but that proves easier said than done. (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: A Difficult Dino Doctor Day: When Thundertot feels sick, Dino Doctors Min and Clover have their work cut out for them when the baby spinosaur refuses to let them examine her. (S2 Ep46)
